name: Howl
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
With a bloodcurling howl, you call for wolves to join you in battle. Two wolves appear anywhere within range, and remain for the duration of the spell. They take their turn after yours, and cannot be commanded. They will not attack any creatures you choose, and will otherwise attack the closest non-chosen creatures to them during their turn. They vanish upon being reduced to 0 hit points.

At the start of each of your turns, two more wolves appear.

When the spell ends, all wolves summoned by this spell vanish.
empower: Summons an additional three wolves immediately.
